website_summaries.verdict: Quick charging, with nine charge modes. Good on motorcycle batteries and many other types of batteries.
pros: Charges lead-acid and lithium-ion batteries up to 400 amp-hours
Charge twice as fast as ordinary chargers
Can jumpstart dead batteries and repair damaged batteries and power DC devices
Can be used with micro-hybrid start-stop vehicles and CANBUS electrical systems
External mounting holes and a rubberized base that avoids surface slipping and scratches
Monitors battery activity for safe and efficient charging
Automatically minimizes energy consumption and includes spark-proof technology, as well as reverse polarity and overcharge protection
Intuitive LED indicators provide visual state-of-charge feedback and diagnostic information
cons: Requires some power to be in battery for diagnostic purposes — battery must have some charge in it

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t last four years, because of poor quality cable.
customer_reviews.text: A little stress relief might prevent it. I have 40 year old battery charger cables that have seen below-zero temperture duty and never has the casing split. This is substandard wire that cannot flex at cold temperature so instead it splits open. NOCO has told me that they will repair this three-year-old unit if I pay to ship it back to them and include a check for $75. So beware: you are responsible for their substandard original materials. Now what do I do, throw away a $150 charger, or try to repair it myself?
customer_reviews.author: Chienmauvais

customer_reviews.title: Electronic magic
customer_reviews.text: This device is really remarkable. My truck's batteries (two for a diesel engine) would die if the truck was idle for more than a month or so. I hooked this device up to one of the batteries, it immediately recognized the 12 volts, it started the trickle charge, moving from 25% to 50% to 75% and finally fully charged and doing its trickle charge, showing red then red then orange, and finally green lights. On "trickle charge", the device may be connected indefinitely. After several weeks, I started the truck and it cranked on at high speed, clearly the effects of a now-fully charged battery. Love this thing, hope to use it for years!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the charger has not repaired 1 out of 4 Batteries, also randomly trips breaker 1. 15amp @120vlts 2. 20amps @ 120vlts neither circuit had any other load connected to while trying to get the charger to charge without randomly tripping both breakers. For this amount of money this unit should work right of the box. I have seen quit a few mixed reviews on this charger and decided to give it a chance. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Boils batteries.
customer_reviews.text: This thing seemed like a great item, but twice now the repair mode has boiled the fluid out of batteries, even sealed ones. Can't believe I spent this much money on something that has now cost me about twice as much in ruined batteries.
customer_reviews.author: average user

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Wireing
customer_reviews.text: The charger seems to be well built, and functions as stated in the description. However, the wires used are of inferior quality. They are undersized and get very stiff in cold weather. Both positive and negative wire insulation has cracked, exposing the copper wire. I used it to charge one battery, and then placed it on a new truck that is being stored for the winter. It is very common to have to use a battery charger in cold weather, The wiring on this charger is not suitable for the job. On the positive side, the clamps are of good quality. NOCO needs to resolve the problem with the poor choice of wiring before I could recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Nicely put together, repair cycle FTW!
customer_reviews.text: I was having serious issues with a CPO (2019) vehicle I purchased 4 months ago killing the battery. I blamed the issue on battery drain from the remote starter as the vehicle sits for 2-10 days sometimes. I purchased this charger to keep things topped up, went with this model because of the repair cycle it offers. After running the repair cycle I have had zero draining or no-start issues. This saved me a trip to the dealer and arguments about warranty. Most importantly, it has now saved me time. Pick the model that works for you, but know that the quality, fit, finish, packaging and functionality of NOCO is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Unstoppable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tender 3 years ago to maintain 4 batteries on my 18 liter Cat tractor. It has worked flawlessly and the tractor starts better now than when the batteries were brand new. When pulling the tractor out, I moved the tender off and placed next to another piece of machinery. Fast forward a week when I was shuffling equipment and I ran over the battery charger. To my surprise this tender survived being run over by my 15 ton combine and still works.
customer_reviews.author: duke

customer_reviews.title: Good charging
customer_reviews.text: The charger seems to charge pretty good. It looks very rugged and robust but I don't think it really is. Power cord seems cheap, the part where it comes out of the charger has already broke only after 4th use. Power cord is very stiff which is indication of cheap wire. The actual charging is pretty good. My diesel was COMPLETELY dead, I ran the jump charger feature 4 times and my truck started up. This was in 6 degree weather. I imagine a regular gas vehicle would only take 1 jump charge maybe 2 at most to get it started.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: This is incredible and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 24v charger so I wouldn't have to disconnect my two 12v batteries in my M151A2, which runs on a 24v system. I also used this charge my 14v aircraft battery. It is literally clamp on, set the program and forget. Does a great job to peak charge. Not heavy to transport. I use it now for all my charging needs even thought I've got some very good quality traditional chargers in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wires break in cold weather. Not useful!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, full-featured charger-- until one goes to use it during cold weather. I pulled it out to charge the battery on my diesel Jeep and found the cord cracked when uncoiling it. A $160 charger where they can't spend the extra $0.50 to use cold-rated wire? Trying to decide if I'm going to just return it to Amazon or replace the leads with better quality wire.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. RHEA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but did not give a full charge in 48 hours of charging.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I guess. I love how easy it is to carry around, but I wish the cord was a little longer. Also, I want to hold off on giving it 5 stars cause for some reason it says it should do a full charge in less then 24 hours, after which you will see only the 100% charge light, but for some reason I charged for 2 full days and still all lights are lit? Going to give it another go and see what happens. I will say that the car did start though, so it does work. Just don't like the fact it didn't charge all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Lino412

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do well with 400 AH
customer_reviews.text: Attached to four Battle Born 100 AH batteries in parallel, this item will not charge past 13.45 v, whereas my solar panels have no difficulty with bright sun to 14.6 v. The advertisement for this unit states it will charge batteries up to 400 AH. It will charge them partially, and is useful in a prolonged low sun environment to protect the batteries so I didn’t give it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lescord

customer_reviews.title: Not a Jump Starter
customer_reviews.text: This is incorrectly advertised on Amazon.com as a "Jump Starter." This causes confusion with the popular lithium jump starters that are also being sold as "Jump Starters" on Amazon. Otherwise, this battery charger is great at charging and maintaining your car's battery. It also comes with a feature to "Jump Charge" a dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: Stevef

customer_reviews.title: beware accessory's you may want to buy! none of ...
customer_reviews.text: beware accessory's you may want to buy! none of the accessory's will fit this model. only gc032 battery clamps. they keep that fact top secret untill you call them or chat on line. now im stuck with their propitiatory connectors. wish that had been stated up front. and dont e-mail them. they wont reply.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit the X-Connect accessories
customer_reviews.text: this is a great charger for all your uses around the garage and boat only problem I had was I bought some X-connect accessories only to find out they don't fit this charger or the larger 26000 model because of the Jump Start feature they have larger connectors and cables keep this in mind if you are looking at the accessories
customer_reviews.author: The Happy Cooker

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ - different from other noco chargers
customer_reviews.text: The g15000 has a fan, so doesn't seem as waterproof as the smaller models. Also, none of the other smaller adapters work with this charger end and there is no adapter from noco to make them work. You only can use it with the monster jumper cable clamps, or remove them to use the eyelet cable (yes, it's one in the same, no separate cables with this model).
customer_reviews.author: EureskoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Does not deliver 15 amps
customer_reviews.text: Using this to charge 12v LiFePo batteries. Charges at 15amps for a few seconds, then backs down to about 10 amps, then 5 amps. I bought this as a way to charge my batteries when I’m forced to charge them from a generator. Was hoping it would maintain 15 amps until the batteries are nearly full. This takes way too long.
customer_reviews.author: LarryB

customer_reviews.title: Over priced 7.5 amp charger.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for 24 volt battery charging. Upon receiving it, 7.5 amps of charging for 24 volts and 15 amps for 12 volts. At 7.5 amps this will not charge the batteries properly, it should be at a minimum of 10 amps. I still tried it, just showed 25% and would not charge past 25.6 volts. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is so easy to use. I’m using it to charge two 12 V batteries on the 24 V cycle. It charges both batteries at the same time. I also used it to jumpstart my neighbors truck. It takes only five minutes for the red lights to move from 25% to 100% and the truck started right up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A.

customer_reviews.title: Clamps will not connect to some GM side terminal batteries
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty clamps do not attach to some GM side terminal batteries as plastic insulation is thick enough on clamp that the copper jaws will connect to terminal bolt. Will install side battery bolt extensions to see if this will solve the problem. No accessories available such as cables with eyelets and quick connector. Must order complete replacement set of battery terminal clamps and then disconnect cables from clamp so that you now have cable with quick connect and eyelets. Charger works well, but because of problems attaching to battery and lack of accessories, I give the product 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best charger I ever had,
customer_reviews.text: This charger is amazing, I was going to throw away two batteries, dead dead dead, one Delco acid with caps, the other one. Optima gel type, my old charger gave out from auto zone, worked over 10 years, this time amazon, I never herd about this charger excellent reviews, I bought it, could not believe it , I charge both first, then used restore MODE, on both, those batteries are back in my car, best charger I ever had , and had many
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great charger; but research before you buy any attachments!
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading for Amazon to recommend all of the genius attachments when they will not even connect with this charger. Had to go to the manufacturers website to figure out that I couldn't use all of the attachments I ordered. Had to return the G15000 and order the slower G7200 to be able to use he attachments.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES COOK

customer_reviews.title: What a bummer
customer_reviews.text: This charger was a real disappointment. After 17 hours this charger could not bring two BRAND NEW deep cycle batteries to full charge. When the charging started, the batteries being charged had a reading of 12.5 bolts DC. Stay away from this charger! I sent it back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my Optima battery
customer_reviews.text: So far this Noco battery charger has helped me save 3 optima batteries and an Odyssey battery. While I doubt I’ll use the Jump Start feature much, it does come in handy for recharging my winch batteries. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ileagle

customer_reviews.title: Charger is great but wires are junk.
customer_reviews.text: Charger and it’s functions are great but the wires are junk. Started fraying and would have shorted out if I hadn’t realized it. Virtually every flex point has broken. They need to fix this. Didn’t take long at all under light use to have these problems.
customer_reviews.author: MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: I cannot heap enough praise on this awesome gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a 2004 Chrysler Crossfire with an as-yet-undetermined electrical leech. I drive it maybe once or twice a week, so, if I fail to start it on the days I don't drive, I'm faced with a stone-dead battery. I hooked this bad boy up, hit the JumpCharge button and... nothin'. I re-read the manual and it said if the JumpCharge function doesn't work, this means the battery is below two volts, so press and hold for three seconds. BINGO! The battery started charging, and literally, within five minutes, I was back to a fully charged 14v battery. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grilled Cheezy

customer_reviews.title: S;ightly deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great product, have yet to use it. The photo shows two style ends that can be used, either the clamp or the ring terminal. These look separate but are not, you have to use the ring terminals to connect to the clamps in order to use them. It looks like you could attach the ring terminals to a battery and leave it installed (which is what I wanted to do), and then still go off and use the charger with the clamps, but you can't. You have to buy more accessories in order to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my choice and like the battery jump feature
customer_reviews.text: When I asked a friend what kind of charger to get for a camper van conversion I am working on, he directed me to NOCO. I purchased the G15000 (15A). Happy with my choice and like the battery jump feature. This will be used for charging/maintaining house batteries when shore power is available. I like the versatility of this charger. I can keep it with the house batteries, but also be pulled out if the vehicle battery ever needs a charge (which I've already used it for) or a jump.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh at best
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't brought any of the batteries back from the dead so far, instead it bloats them. Propriety connectors really hold you back, none of the noco accessories work with this charger so you are stuck with what you get when it comes to wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Token

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Compact, easy to use and great quality. Works great to charge a diesel van with a two battery system. I charged both by connecting directly to the battery under the hood but you can also disconnect each battery from the vehicle and charge them individually achieving a more complete charge of the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Chis

customer_reviews.title: Love this Charger! Granpa is offended and insists on using his traditional charger
customer_reviews.text: I use 12V pumps to spray cleaning chemicals onto homes and buildings. I charge batteries weekly and am so happy I made this purchase. Granpas old battery charger did cause my last two group 27s to have a short life. New batteries, new charger, new beginnings!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good if you know your car
customer_reviews.text: My opinion isnt good cause I misread . Was looking for portable but it wouldn't have mattered battery was completely dead on car and I couldn't tell what type of battery so I had to tow to dealer
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Figured out how to use this in no time. Purchased for a car that I let sit for too long. The battery was really dead and because of its capacity, had to charge overnight. Car started next morning no problem. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Michellie

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Wires cracked in four places creating spark when trying to charge-on 1st use. Charger not able to use in sub zero weather?!-that's exactly when you need a jump start. Very poor quality of coating on wires-unable to withstand cold weather. Dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Dee T.

customer_reviews.title: Great offline charger, doesnt do well while hooked up to car
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit but I cannot get it to operate while the battery is still connected to the car. It does its checks and powers off. Once I disconnect the terminal and charge the battery standalone, it works fine. Jumpstarter is not as useful as I had planned.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I seem to burn through chargers and hopefully this one will last. It's already restored one car battery and marine back to 100%. It took a while to do it but I was told it won't take as long now that they've been repaired if I maintain them now. So far I'm satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Saxmang

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend if you're looking
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it. Ha saved me at least 2 batteries that otherwise would have needed replaced. Would recommend if you're looking, it's worth the premium price
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: It functions exactly as described. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to properly charge off the grid batteries at camping sites. I have also found it able to rejuvenate old batteries to peak performance. There has to be some power left in them for it to work, but that was made known in the descriptions and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mc

customer_reviews.title: No customer service
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after less than 6 months ... no option to call for customer support... no call back from support line ... highest priced charger available still garbage!!
customer_reviews.author: derik strenzel

customer_reviews.title: it has been great! I needed a quick connect but none are ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great- I don't use it enough to remember what settings are for agm/regular batteries. Each time you use it, it has been great! I needed a quick connect but none are made for the 15000 model. So I cobbled up one so I can go from vehicle to tractor.
customer_reviews.author: MRCHIRO

customer_reviews.title: great battery conditioner and maintainer
customer_reviews.text: had bought this units smaller brother and then this one for my F250. It works great to keep the truck ready to go, even after months of sitting idle. The is a great manufacturer producing a state of the art device. The jump start function did not really give enough oomph to get the engine started from a totally dead battery, but to keep things fully charged and read this is exactly right. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: It's a battery charger!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as advertised. Don't buy the suggested extension cable GC004 recommended with it, it doesn't fit .
customer_reviews.author: HND

customer_reviews.title: For 12V and 24 Volt lead acid, AGM, and Lithium batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Charges batteries slowly but efficiently. Seems to be well engineered to avoid charging problems.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Works on standard batteries and my AG ones as well.
customer_reviews.text: Very very well made and advanced. Only negative thing is the jump start function is lame. Recharged several dead batteries that my old chargers could not handle.
customer_reviews.author: Aden

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: Works great, keeps my Red Top Battery full charged and maintained.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Dont work
customer_reviews.text: if it doesn't work, I have to Return it back
customer_reviews.author: Boloncho Colima

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Excellant device. The Genius solves all my battery charging problems
customer_reviews.author: Gary Begley

customer_reviews.title: A mechanics dream
customer_reviews.text: Absolute great product no regrets definitely Must have if your looking for a charger and maintainer. The jump start option is a great bonus if you have a vehicle that’s been sitting for a long time and your trying to bring it back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Reshard Saladin

customer_reviews.title: G15000
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase. Found my battery completely dead, didn't even have enough juice to actuate the door locks. But once I hooked it up to the charger it reached 100% in about 6 hours, and battery has so far held the charge. I like that it's alot more compact than my friends charger, and is alot lighter. Also easy to use, and would certainly recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Lithium Battery
customer_reviews.text: Charges like a dream. So glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: TFields

customer_reviews.title: These things have recovered bad batteries and help keep my good batteries going strong
customer_reviews.text: I have three different rated NOCO Genius chargers. My go big and get he big one. These things have recovered bad batteries and help keep my good batteries going strong. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this charger extensively for a few months now. I have many vehicles and solar arrays with a big battery bank, that sometimes need a charge Boost. It’s sturdy, good clamps, fast charging and small in size. As far as I’m concerned it doesn’t get any better!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie C. Lofgren

customer_reviews.title: works much better at charging batteries back to full charge when my ...
customer_reviews.text: works much better at charging batteries back to full charge when my other charger couldn't recharge them and would say "bad" for a battery the only thing that would make it a 5-star would be to add a digital window that gives you the status or info on the battery you are charging, but if that doesn't interest you then it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use. It was defective upon arrival. Also don’t purchase any of the amazon recommended add on’s because those are not compatible with this item even though it says it is ( confirmed that with the norco company)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Alaniz

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD THIS FOR COUPLE OF MONTHS NOW AND HAVE USED IT A FEW TIMES. SO FAR, IT HAD DONE ITS JOB VERY WELL.
customer_reviews.author: David.S

customer_reviews.title: Well made and does a very good job of charging
customer_reviews.text: My charger that I had finally died two weeks ago and had to have another quickly. I looked at reviews on the net as I usually do and came across the NOCO Genius. Well made and does a very good job of charging. The wires don't get hot like my other one did which won't name but is a well know charger. It's well made also.
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: Good charger.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this charger. Wish the wires were flexible in the colder weather. Solid clamps. Numerous power options. Seems a good company.
customer_reviews.author: ALBEE

customer_reviews.title: Short Life
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK for a short time, then failed completely and would not charge or maintain any of my vehicle lead-acid batteries. Checked and re-checked cables and fuses, all OK. An expensive unit for just 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Porter

customer_reviews.title: this thing works great. until they figure out what the issue is ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing works great. until they figure out what the issue is with my battery this is the perfect solution. I get several jumps from one charge
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I like the indicator lights.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good seems to charge my batteries. I like the indicator lights.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Boehlke

customer_reviews.title: Charged my battery right up.
customer_reviews.text: Very smart instrument that knows what type of battery you are charging and suggests the correct settings. Also warns you if you connect the battery incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rothschild

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Charger. Thanks first one was so awesome I got a 2nd
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Behlen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Race Cars
customer_reviews.text: Ultra safe battery charging. I pulled the AGM battery from a blown alcohol dragster and hooked this up to it and it was all restored and charged within 2 hours from being completely dead. In an application like this, the Noco charger is the guarantee from exploding batteries at the track or at home.
customer_reviews.author: levi

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Feels solid. Looks solid. Charges all my batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Burke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice charger.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice charger...lots of settings and features. You won't be disappointed. Clearly written user manual is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent multipurpose battery charger
customer_reviews.text: Excellent multipurpose battery charger, maintainer. Simple to use smart device has brought life back to near dead batteries.
customer_reviews.author: N Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best investment I have ever made to look after and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best investment I have ever made to look after and protect my batteries on my Bus. I would but this product again in a heart beat...Thinking of getting one for my golf cart.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Rabalais

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PRICEY BUT WORKS WELL. BOUGHT IT FOR MY 24V BATTERY BANK.
customer_reviews.author: H Q Pham

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sized rings ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with 3/8 in rings, although most batteries now use 5/16 in posts. Unless you are willing to put oversized rings on your battery posts, which I don't like to do, its useless.
customer_reviews.author: captaindave

customer_reviews.title: Great unit! This thing operates just as designed
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! This thing operates just as designed. Was able to resurrect a iffy battery on my Harley. Paid for itself just with that application. Was worth the extra money to have the optional jumpstart feature built in as well. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, worked great and does a great job monitoring my batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Mean Man

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Best thinh i have ever bought. Does exactly what it advertises and has a perfect premium finish highly reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedNomad787

customer_reviews.title: It was bigger than I thought...
customer_reviews.text: Work quietly and is very effective. Using to realign a solar battery bank. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Charges faster then smaller version but still only repairs at 1.5 amps
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been disappointed by other chargers but this product is amazing. I does either 12V or 24V is heavy duty and is easy to connect. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cats Meow

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to charge my lithium motorcycle battery. It was practically at dead and charged it within a day. It maintains the charge and indicates what status your battery is at and automatically detects the type of battery. Easy plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeping my two 6V deep cycle RV batteries in shape! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: ... battery back to life that simple This is an amazing tool.
customer_reviews.text: It brought my battery back to life that simple This is an amazing tool...
customer_reviews.author: Charly

customer_reviews.title: Item that’s a bargain for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Availability for usage. Jump starter for vehicles, and being able to use it for charging cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: cliff pollard

customer_reviews.title: Good one, but I was thinking it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good one, but I was thinking it has a battery inside to be used as a Jumper. Unfortunately works using AC only and description wasn't detailed enough to understand it before buying
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Best little unit , charges batteries plus the repair function works great . No complaints so far
customer_reviews.author: sabrina dean

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Very well built, I use this charger for my AGM batteries for my sound system. I couldn’t ask for anything else!
customer_reviews.author: M.mills

customer_reviews.title: Warning!!! There are no accessories available for the G15000!!!
customer_reviews.text: Warning!!! There are no accessories available for the G15000 beyond a replacement set of clamps. I ordered this product with a few accessory items. None of them fit. I then did alot of research and found that none of the accessories fit the G15000 nor the G26000. I also contacted NOCO customer service with no reply. Another reviewer pointed at that he contacted customer service and was told that there are no plans to make accessories for the G26000. I assume the 26000 and the 15000 are the same connector, so that means there are no planned accessories for the it either. Its a shame, because the accessories are the whole reason I picked this unit over several others.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crider

customer_reviews.title: Exapensive but good
customer_reviews.text: Works are desciribed. Charged several batterys. I wanted to use it before I left this review. Its better than a regular charger. I reccomend it.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the charger
customer_reviews.text: I really like the charger, appears to be well built and is certainly easy to operate. The picture is a misleading, to use the battery connections, you have to remove them from the battery clamps. The pictures make is seem as though the charger comes with both. Just an FYI.
customer_reviews.author: A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: NOCO G15000
customer_reviews.text: Bought the G15000 and left it for charging 10am yesterday, still can't boot up today. Everytime I unplug the socket, it just went dead. Doesn't response to any of the buttons at all.

customer_reviews.text: where most chragers fail, this really does save a dead battery

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I'd expected, kept my 'live in' RV batteries in fine shape
customer_reviews.author: busnut

customer_reviews.title: essentially a power supply -- not a portable battery
customer_reviews.text: I suppose this is OK. It is a glorified high-amperage 12-24VDC power supply. It has NO internal battery (which I initially assumed for this price) which means it must be plugged in to work. They make portable batteries that you can take with you in your vehicle for jumps on the road. This is NOT like that. Except for my mistake, I'm glad I got the multi-purpose one which I might be able to use around the shop once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: gaaah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was at a good price, vendor shipped fast. Does exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very reliable, exactly what I wanted and on time. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Cook

customer_reviews.title: ... to charge my AGM boat battery and it works great, though it is a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to charge my AGM boat battery and it works great, though it is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: t_eric_m

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: Really nice well built unit. I'm sure it does a great job charging and keeping a battery charged. BUT contrary to advertisement, it won't charge a battery that is completely drained... I had to use a booster to jump my car, then let it run for a little bit to get some juice in the battery then shut it off & plugged in this thing to charge up the battery to %100... Unless I'm missing something. It does nothing on a completely dead battery..
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: NOCO Genius G15000 12V/24V 15 Amp Pro-Series Battery Charger and Maintainer
product_meta.description: NOCO Genius smart battery chargers are some of the safest and most advanced on the market. One of our best, the G15000 15 Amp is designed to charge 12-volt and 24-volt lead-acid and lithium-ion batteries up to 400Ah. It can also effectively maintain automotive, marine, RV, lawn & garden and deep-cycle batteries. It charges 2x faster than ordinary battery chargers, can jump start dead batteries, repair damaged batteries, power DC devices and is designed to use with micro-hybrid start-stop vehicles and CANBUS electrical systems. Guided by an onboard microcomputer, the G15000 monitors battery activity for safe and efficient charging, automatically minimizes energy consumption and provides redundant levels of safety protection, including spark-proof technology, as well as reverse polarity and overcharge protection. It can remain safely connected 24/7, while its streamlined design makes it ultra-compact, portable and incredibly lightweight. The G15000 features external mounting holes and a rubberized base that avoids surface slipping and scratches, all while remaining impact, UV and water-resistant (IP44). Intuitive LED indicators provide visual state-of-charge feedback and diagnostic information, even when in maintenance mode. Designed for use on 120-volt, 50-60Hz electrical systems, the G15000 includes HD X-Connect battery clamps with detachable eyelet terminals and a 5-year limited.
feature_bullets: A powerful, professional grade battery charger and battery maintenance tool designed to recharge all types of batteries rapidly in workshops, garages or those you simply want the best.
Perfect for keeping your vehicles fully charged and maintained during year-round battery maintenance or long-term storage for improved performance and longevity.
Works with all types of 12-volt and 24-volt lead-Acid batteries, including wet, gel, and AGM, or any common automotive, deep-cycle, marine, or maintenance-free battery.

Keep your battery fully charged without worry or overcharge. Simply plug-in and let our advanced charging technology automatically monitor and maintain your battery. Progressive repair mode for heavily sulfated 12v batteries.
Use our advanced repair mode to reverse the damaging effects when batteries are left uncharged for extended periods to improve battery performance and longevity.
Convert the battery charger into a 5-amp constant-current, constant-voltage power supply for maintaining onboard computer member during battery changes or as a DC power source.
An optimized charge mode for safely charging and maintaining 12-volt lithium-ion batteries, and recommended with use on lithium batteries with an internal BMS.
One of the most advanced and safest battery chargers, including spark-proof technology, and reverse polarity protection, plus backed by our 5-year and endless accessories.

specifications.Cover Included: G15000 UltraSafe Battery Charger, Battery Clamps with Integrated Eyelet Terminals, User Guide, 5-Year Limited Warranty
